name: Super Yachts Parking Simulator - Real Boats Race Driving Test Park Racing Games
name_original: Super Yachts Parking Simulator - Real Boats Race Driving Test Park Racing Games
description:
Park a HUGE collection of Sailing Boats, Motorboats, Speedboats, Super Yachts and Military Spec Ships. With real water physics and unique realistic boat handling, every craft is a brand new challenge to park!

SET SAIL TODAY
Pilot TWENTY Beautiful Boats, including: graceful sailing boats, powerful and fast speed boats, expensive motor yachts, even more ridiculously expensive super yachts and huge navy ships!

CRUISE CONTROL
You’ll need to understand the different motion and capabilities of each of your craft to succeed in parking them without damage. Feel the thrill of navigation and the sweet, salty taste of success in the seas!

MARINAS & HARBOURS
Cruise around and park your boat up in some beautiful coastal locations including: the luxury marina club, the mid-sea slalom course, the rocky outcrop, the estuary harbor, the industrial port bay, the river valley and the sailing club mooring jetty.

FREE TO PLAY
The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to Play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes that alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through In-App Purchases. Each mode has separate GameCenter leaderboards to make for totally fair competition!

COMPETE ON THE HIGH SEAS!
Race against the Worlds best sailors and compare your rank with the online leaderboards! Can you be the Master of the Seas?


GAME FEATURES
▶ 20 Beautiful and Unique Boats in 5 themed categories
▶ 60 Interesting and Intense Missions to complete
▶ 100% Free-2-Play Sailing Career Mode
▶ Customisable Control Methods (Tilt, Buttons, Wheel & NEW MFi Game Controller Support)
▶ Multiple Cameras to get the best view on your parking spot
▶ Extra Easier Game Modes available as optional In-App Purchases
▶ Runs on anything from (or better than) the iPhone 4, iPad 2, iPad Mini & iPod Touch (4th Generation)
